title: Keybinds working?
body:
How come when I don't ring the new client in admin my key-binds don't work, but when i run it in admin they all of a sudden work again. 
Before the problem occurred key binds worked fine w/o running as admin.

replies.body:
There could be a security setting blocking your from properly saving or using your config settings.  The steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide should help make sure league files are added as an exception.  If necessary, I also recommend resetting your config just in case it's failing to properly read your input in case that the permissions is a coincidence.

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

I hope that helps!
